title: Frontend Developer Intern
description: Work on React-based web applications and assist the development team in building UI components.

title: Data Analyst Intern
description: Analyze financial datasets, prepare reports, and assist in predictive modeling using Python and Excel.

title: Marketing Intern
description: Support the marketing team in social media campaigns, content creation, and client outreach.

title: Machine Learning Intern
description: Develop machine learning models, perform data preprocessing, and collaborate on AI research projects.
